thread.title: Twitter, Skype, Amazon: why does the internet keep breaking?
thread.title_full: Twitter, Skype, Amazon: why does the internet keep breaking? - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Twitter, Skype, Amazon: why does the internet keep breaking?
text:
Big internet names have been cutting out and dropping off in the last week. Why are they playing with us in this way?
First it was Twitter, the desktop client of which went down for over an hour last week, (that’s almost a year in Twitter time). Then it was Amazon Web Services, which glitched and took with it the likes of ... »
